Work Description: Project initialization: Setup of Git repository, virtual environment, and initial directory structure for Kisaan CV Service.
Database Schema Design: Defined SQLAlchemy models for Users, Crop Scans, and initial Disease Detection tables.
API Development: Implemented basic FastAPI application structure, health checks, and logging configuration.
Gemini AI Integration: Research and implementation of the initial interface for interacting with Gemini Vision Pro models.
Core Logic Implementation: Developed services for image preprocessing and handling responses from the AI model.
Crop Scan Endpoint: Implemented the primary /process_image endpoint for analyzing crop health.
S3 Integration: Set up AWS S3 bucket and implemented helper functions for uploading and retrieving images.
Exception Handling: Enhanced error handling for AI service timeouts and invalid image formats.
Authentication Middleware: Integrated basic API key validation and user context management.
Unit Testing: Wrote initial unit tests for the scan service and database models.
Report Generation: Started implementation of PDF report generation logic based on scan results.
S3 & UX: Finalized S3 report upload flow and refined the user experience for the health scan API.
Bug Fixing: Resolved issues with presigned URLs for report access and verified data persistence.
Pre-deployment: Prepared initial Dockerfile and requirements.txt for containerization.
GitHub Deployment: Containerized application with Docker, resolved auth issues, and renamed API endpoints.
Deployment Config: Focused on health check endpoints and configuring Git for secure pushing.
API Refinement: Refined API structure and troubleshot deployment configurations for staging.
CI/CD & Docker: Tested Docker containerization logic and validated pipeline readiness.
Code Review: General maintenance, code cleanup, and optimization for production.
Production Prep: Resolved docker-compose build issues and finalized containerization checks.
Scan Optimization: Resolved 504 Timeouts, implemented async processing with Redis, and fixed bounding box issues.
Payments Start: Refined PaymentTransaction model and ran migrations for Cashfree integration.
Payment APIs: Implemented create-order, verify, and webhook endpoints for payment lifecycle.
Frontend Test: Developed payment_test.html for interactive testing of the payment flow.
Payment Verification: Ensured robust payment lifecycle handling and verified database updates.
UPI Links: Refactored order creation to return comprehensive UPI deep links (Bhim, GPay, etc.) in response.
Integration Testing: Verified payment link generation and refactored integration logic.
Scan Refinement: Removed unused parameters (is_mixed_cropping) and verified two-stage analysis workflow.
Cleanup & Push: Removed temporary scripts, verified Docker build locally, and pushed final code to dev branch.
